title: Any-Chat-Completions-Mcp
description: A TypeScript-based MCP server that integrates Claude with any OpenAI SDK-compatible Chat Completion API, enabling multi-provider AI chat functionalities in Claude Desktop.
creator: pyroprompts

AI_CHAT_KEY.description: API key to authenticate requests with the configured AI Chat Provider.

AI_CHAT_NAME.description: Name of the AI Chat Provider.

AI_CHAT_MODEL.description: Model identifier for the selected AI Chat Provider.

AI_CHAT_BASE_URL.description: Base URL of the API for the AI Chat Provider.
